participant_1.background:
I am an artist from a small town in the midwest.
i have a law degree.
i give out sports information.
I get lost in my music or tinkering with my car.
I would have lunch with my brothers to thank them for their support.

participant_2.background:
I'm cold, but I'm happy to be with my family.
my favorite animal is the panda.
i drive an acara.
during the week i go to college to become a lawyer.
I enjoy strawberries because they are a sweet and juicy treat.

content.text: Hello! I'm doing well, thank you! I'm just a little cold, but I'm happy to be with my family.
That's nice to hear. What are you doing today?
Today I'm just relaxing and enjoying the company of my family. I'm also working on my car. What are you doing today?
Today I'm working on a new painting. I'm an artist from a small town in the midwest.
That's really cool! I've always enjoyed art. What kind of art do you do?
I mostly do landscapes and portraits. I also do some abstract art.
I love landscapes! I'm not very good at drawing, but I love looking at art.
Thank you! I'm glad you enjoy it. What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to spend time with my family, go to the movies, and play video games.
Sounds like you have a lot of fun! I love playing video games too.
Yeah, they're a great way to relax. What are some of your favorite games?
I like to play a lot of different games, but I'm really into the new Call of Duty.
I've heard that's a lot of fun. I've been playing a lot of Mario Kart lately.
Mario Kart is always a classic! I've been playing that game since I was a kid.
Me too! It's so much fun to play with friends.
Definitely! It's one of my favorite multiplayer games.
It's really nice talking to you.
You too! It's been nice to meet you
